_header: Alas departing is ground of woe
Note:
Cf. 260; Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 94.
_description: A love song for two voices — one 8-line stanza with music

BodAsh191IV.First Lines:
Alas departynge is ground of wooodyr songe can y not
                    syng…
BodAsh191IV.Last Lines:
…þat to the deth hit wil me bryngbut yf y se hir
                    hastily
